Pirate Life IPA.description: Our flagship beer. The beer that inspired this crazy journey. Our take on an American IPA. Pine, punchy and assertive. Solid malt background and huge hop flavours with pine and citrus characters.

Pirate Life Throwback IPA.description: A mid-strength IPA that's big on flavour. Pine, punchy and assertive. Solid malt background and huge hop flavours with pine and citrus characters.

Hop Nation Jedi Juice.description: A hazy, juicy IPA with a restrained bitterness and a punchy, fruit-forward hop character. Brewed with oats and wheat and left unfiltered for a smooth juicy hit.

BrewDog Punk IPA.description: This transatlantic fusion IPA is light golden in colour with tropical fruits and light caramel on the nose. The palate soon becomes assertive and resinous with the New Zealand hops balanced by the biscuit malt. The finish is aggressive and dry with the hops emerging over the warming alcohol.

Mountain Goat Fancy Pants.description: A hoppy American style Amber Ale. The malt base is a blend of Pale, Munich and Crystal malts with a touch of wheat. The hops are a blend of American and Australian hops. The beer is fermented with an American Ale yeast which contributes to the clean flavour and aroma.

Seirra Nevada Torpedo.description: Sierra Nevada and hops go hand in hand. What began as a crazy idea scribbled in a pub eventually became our newest year-round hop bomb, Torpedo Extra IPA. The first beer to feature our "Hop Torpedo"â€”a revolutionary dry-hopping device that controls how much hop aroma is imparted into beer without adding additional bitterness. Torpedo Extra IPA is an aggressive yet balanced beer with massive hop aromas of citrus, pine, and tropical fruit.

Stone & Wood Pacific Ale.description: Inspired by our home on the edge of the Pacific Ocean and brewed using all Australian barley, wheat and Galaxy hops, Pacific Ale is cloudy and golden with a big fruity aroma and a refreshing finish. After being dry hopped at the end of fermentation, Stone & Wood Pacific Ale is then drawn straight from the storage tank at the brewery into kegs for your pleasure.

Little Creatures Bright Ale.description: A refreshing summer style beer, our Bright Ale is brewed using a blend of barley and wheat malts. It's fermented with a clean, neutral strain of yeast which allows the subtle malt and hop characters to shine through. The beer is then dry hopped with a selection of our favourite hop varieties to add a vibrant floral and citrus aroma.

Brad's Black Beauty (Black DIPA).description: A big, black, hoppy beer. Aroma of citrus and pine. Flavour of roasted malt, coffee and chocolate. Big hop bitterness and flavour.

Yeastie Boys Gunnamatta Earl Grey IPA.description: Gunnamatta Earl Grey IPA is a new world India Pale Ale with subtle aromas of tea and grapefruit, brewed with the addition of Earl Grey Blue Flower tea. A firm malt base balances out the hops and tea to create a dangerously drinkable IPA.
